page.title: 13Some Details On Pollution
page.content: { Titanium Dioxide}is made by Tioxide UK and Laportes on the Humber bank. It is used for{paints, paper, plastics, {cosmetics}and many other products as well. The waste products from Tioxide are{solid ore}which is unused , liquids containing{sulphuric acid and {ferrous sulphate}which are dumped into the estuary. It affects our area because when it is discharged into the Humber it produces a{plume of polluted {water}which is 20 to 40 metres wide and 1km long when tidal flows are at a maximum. Evidence shows four main parts of this discharge are acid, ferrous compounds, suspended matter and trace elements. One effect is{red {staining}of the river banks the effect on the biology of the river is {debateable}some experts claim that the river is less polluted than many other estuaries others disagree with this.
